hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Az-Zahiriyah about 'Abdullah bin Busr, he said:"I was sitting beside him on Friday and he said: 'A man came, stepping over people's necks, and the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: 'Sit down, you are disturbing people

chapter.ara-name: النَّهْيُ عَنْ تَخَطِّي رِقَابِ النَّاسِ وَالإِمَامُ عَلَى الْمِنْبَرِ يَوْمَ الْجُمُعَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The Prohibition Of Stepping Over People's Necks When The Imam Is On The Minbar On Friday
